net.greghaines.jesque.admin

Class AdminClientImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.greghaines.jesque.admin.AbstractAdminClient
      • net.greghaines.jesque.admin.AdminClientImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdminClient

    public class AdminClientImpl
extends AbstractAdminClient
    AdminClientImpl publishes jobs to channels.
    Author:
    Greg Haines

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEFAULT_CHECK_CONNECTION_BEFORE_USE
      The default behavior for checking connection validity before use.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdminClientImpl(Config config)
      Create a new AdminClientImpl, which creates it's own connection to Redis using values from the config.
      AdminClientImpl(Config config, boolean checkConnectionBeforeUse)
      Create a new AdminClientImpl, which creates it's own connection to Redis using values from the config.
      AdminClientImpl(Config config, long initialDelay, long period, TimeUnit timeUnit)
      Create a new AdminClientImpl, which creates it's own connection to Redis using values from the config and spawns a thread to ensure the connection stays open.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void doPublish(String queue, String jobJson)
      Actually publish the serialized job.
      void end()
      Quits the connection to the Redis server.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_CHECK_CONNECTION_BEFORE_USE

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_CHECK_CONNECTION_BEFORE_USE
        The default behavior for checking connection validity before use.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdminClientImpl

        public AdminClientImpl(Config config)
        Create a new AdminClientImpl, which creates it's own connection to Redis using values from the config. It will not verify the connection before use.
        Parameters:
        config - used to create a connection to Redis

      • AdminClientImpl

        public AdminClientImpl(Config config,
                       boolean checkConnectionBeforeUse)
        Create a new AdminClientImpl, which creates it's own connection to Redis using values from the config.
        Parameters:
        config - used to create a connection to Redis
        checkConnectionBeforeUse - check to make sure the connection is alive before using it
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the config is null

      • AdminClientImpl

        public AdminClientImpl(Config config,
                       long initialDelay,
                       long period,
                       TimeUnit timeUnit)
        Create a new AdminClientImpl, which creates it's own connection to Redis using values from the config and spawns a thread to ensure the connection stays open.
        Parameters:
        config - used to create a connection to Redis
        initialDelay - the time to delay first connection check
        period - the period between successive connection checks
        timeUnit - the time unit of the initialDelay and period parameters

    • Method Detail

      • doPublish

        protected void doPublish(String queue,
                         String jobJson)
        Actually publish the serialized job.
        Specified by:
        doPublish in class AbstractAdminClient
        Parameters:
        queue - the queue to add the Job to
        jobJson - the serialized Job

      • end

        public void end()
        Quits the connection to the Redis server.
